questions.question: Can you describe a time when you had to perform feature engineering on a dataset? What techniques did you use and why?
How do you approach model selection and hyperparameter tuning for a machine learning problem? Can you give an example of a time when you used a particular technique to improve model performance?
Can you walk us through your process for deploying a machine learning model using Flask and Docker? How do you ensure that the model is properly integrated with the front-end application?
How do you handle imbalanced datasets in machine learning? Can you describe a time when you used a particular technique, such as oversampling or undersampling, to improve model performance?

Can you explain the concept of explainability in machine learning and how you would implement it in a real-world project using techniques such as SHAP or LIME? Why is explainability important in machine learning?
